post_text: The food pantry at the Orleans Federated Church in Orleans will become a summer meals site for three Fridays: July 24, July 31, and August 7. On those days from 11:30a-1:30pm, anyone who has children 18 or under living in their home is eligible to receive meal kits that include two breakfasts and two lunches. There is no paperwork necessary and no income verification needed. Parents or guardians are able to pick up meals, as children do not need to be present to receive the meals. Please spread the word!

Apply on schoolspring.com, job ID: 3290864 or send complete application to:

Julie Lavine, Preschool Director
130 Kinsey Road, Barton, VT 05822
802-525-6255, jlavine@ocsu.org

Criminal record check required * E.O.E.
